attributes.action: We demand the U.K. Immediately stops all financial and military aid to Israel for the crimes being committed against the people of Palestine
attributes.additional_details: Every person I have spoken to is outraged by the actions of the Israeli government against the people and nation of Palestine. No UK citizen wants their taxes to go to support the actions of war criminals. We want the UK to cease all aid to Israel, and divert the funds to the disenfranchised of Palestine ( both Gaza & West Bank).
